description:
In Death, Soul & Robots ya play as a cute little kitty on a quest to find the soul of Planet 42 and save Earth from being wrecked. Ya gotta battle unique enemies, solve challenging puzzles and explore various levels to reach ya goal.

The game has six big biomes, seven types of weapons, heaps of different quests, and more than ten characters, each with their own story. Ya also need to defeat six powerful bosses, and it takes a fair bit of effort to do so.

Ya will come across various characters that will blow ya mind with their stories. And by the end of the game, ya will have to make an ethical decision that will affect the ending.

Death, Soul & Robots is a rip-roaring adventure with a top-notch gameplay. So, put on ya seatbelt and get ready to save the Earth, mate?
name: Death, Soul & Robots
